title: Why would my Thunderbird need two clicks to close ??? sudenly started after last update
content: Why would my Thunderbird need two clicks to close ??? sudenly started after last update
creator: ncc1701d95838

title: Thunderbird quit working today
content:
Thunderbird quit working today. I can start it, look at one email and then it hangs. It says it's loading. I tried starting it while holding down the shift key. Didn't help. I reinstalled Thunderbird. Didn't help. I started windows 10 in safe mode. Didn't help. Deleted the .msf files. Didn't help.

What else can I do?

Thanks, Alan
creator: alan249

title: get support
content: need support to access my email address
creator: pilladolesterowsi

title: cmc email account
content: no access to cmc
creator: pilladolesterowsi

title: Error when trying to save or send message on Linux
content:
Hello, I've had some random error crop up on my Ubuntu install of Thunderbird. It suddenly won't let me do anything with outgoing email, whether that's saving a draft or sending it. This happens regardless of which email account and server it's on (both MS and Google) and no matter what is in the message. I have no issues getting messages or moving things around folder to folder within Thunderbird. I also do not have this issue on my various Mac installations using the same email accounts. Based on some other digging, I've already tried resetting my OAuth tokens and that did nothing. I've run the developer console and found the following messages when trying to save:

mailnews.send: NS_ERROR_FAILURE: Component returned failure code: 0x80004005 (NS_ERROR_FAILURE) [nsIFile.createUnique] 

   createMessageFile resource:///modules/MimeMessage.sys.mjs:69    createAndSendMessage resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:145    CompleteGenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6446    GenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6362    SaveAsDraft chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7069    Save chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7047    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1044    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1261    goDoCommand chrome://messenger/content/globalOverlay.js:99    oncommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/messengercompose.xhtml:1

MessageSend.sys.mjs:147:32 

   createAndSendMessage resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:147    CompleteGenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6446    GenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6362    SaveAsDraft chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7069    Save chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7047    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1044    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1261    goDoCommand chrome://messenger/content/globalOverlay.js:99    oncommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/messengercompose.xhtml:1

mailnews.send: Sending failed; , exitCode=2147500037, originalMsgURI= MessageSend.sys.mjs:341:32 

   fail resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:341    createAndSendMessage resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:155    CompleteGenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6446    GenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6362    SaveAsDraft chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7069    Save chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7047    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1044    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1261    goDoCommand chrome://messenger/content/globalOverlay.js:99    oncommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/messengercompose.xhtml:1


Then I get something similar when trying to send: mailnews.send: NS_ERROR_FAILURE: Component returned failure code: 0x80004005 (NS_ERROR_FAILURE) [nsIFile.createUnique] 

   createMessageFile resource:///modules/MimeMessage.sys.mjs:69    createAndSendMessage resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:145    CompleteGenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6446    GenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6362    SendMessageWithCheck chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7021    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1116    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1261    goDoCommand chrome://messenger/content/globalOverlay.js:99    oncommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/messengercompose.xhtml:1

MessageSend.sys.mjs:147:32 

   createAndSendMessage resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:147    CompleteGenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6446    GenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6362    SendMessageWithCheck chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7021    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1116    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1261    goDoCommand chrome://messenger/content/globalOverlay.js:99    oncommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/messengercompose.xhtml:1

mailnews.send: Sending failed; , exitCode=2147500037, originalMsgURI= MessageSend.sys.mjs:341:32 

   fail resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:341    createAndSendMessage resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:155    CompleteGenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6446    GenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6362    SendMessageWithCheck chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7021    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1116    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1261    goDoCommand chrome://messenger/content/globalOverlay.js:99    oncommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/messengercompose.xhtml:1


What on earth is going on here? It looks like it's failing to actually create the file that holds the message and that failure prevents anything else from happening. Thanks!
creator: grossman7

title: issues with sent items ( attachments)
content: I sent an email with an attachment. I later needed to check what I had sent. I went to sent items for one of my accounts. I found the email. There should have been three attachments but there were none. I used a browser to check the account and could only then retrieve the attachments. I checked setting and the keep attachments was ticked. This is a basic function please advise as I rely strongly on not keeping everything stored in a second place
creator: Moi

title: Gmail: Moving and archiving won't delete from the server
content:
Really, this is here: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1464556

But I could not find it as "My Question". But it is also my question. Because I still have 11,000+ email messages with many duplicates and no way to clean them out, because even trying to look at the folder puts TB into a spin....

So much lameness.
creator: RayKiddy

title: Can’t Send or Receive Email via Thunderbird
content: I can’t send or receive emails using Thunderbird. My Gmail is working fine so I was told to contact you. When sending, I get a message which says “Sending failed. Message couldn’t be sent because the connection to the outgoing server SMTP timed out. Try again.” It’s been a week and I’m still trying! Help!
creator: debby6160

title: Filter emails
content: Hello, how are you? How do I get Thunderbird to filter and move messages from an email account already registered in Thunderbird as per the example below: All messages I sent in 2024 and move them to the Sent2024 folder I'll be waiting, thank you.

title: Nelze odeslat e-mail v aplikace Thunderbird - Chyba 5.7.1 end-of-message
content:
Dobrý den, při odeslání e-mailu mi vyzkočila chybová hláška 5.7.1 END-OF-MESSAGE a e-mail nebyl odeslán. Prosím o radu, co dělat.

Děkuji Bobková
creator: petriotbobo

title: Mail dopo aggiornamento 128.6.0esr
content: Salve, purtroppo dopo l'aggiornamento 128.6.0esr non ricevo piu mail, alla scansione risulta come se non ci fosse posta in arrivo ma se mi collego al servizio webmail del server utilizzato (Aruba) le mail ci sono. Come posso risolvere?!! Grazie anticipate.
creator: slegalecommerciale

title: Thunderbird
content: T.a.v. Mark Heijl, Dank voor je antwoord. Dat mijn e-mail, verzonden items en prullenbak gelijk leeg gaan bij het openen is gekomen gelijk na de Up-Date van Thunderbird. Als het aan mij lag, zou ik drie keer achter elkaar de zelfde fout gemaakt hebben. Lijkt me sterk. Vriendelijke groet, André
creator: anger.a60

title: duplication of profile account name
content: In transferring Thunderbird to a new pc I have somehow ended up with 2 identical account names. One uses pop, the other imap. Looking at the profile folders, one is labelled 'default' and the other 'default-release'. (1) What is a 'default-release' profile please? (2) how do I find out which profile relates to which account name (the accounts have contain different folders) and then safely get rid of one of the accounts so that everything goes through the imap server setting? Thank you.
creator: ecvessey

title: Install latest version of Thunderbird over my old version
content:
Dear community,

I need help with installing the latest Thunderbird version. I am using Linux Mint 21.3 Cinnamon and have Thunderbird 115.18.0 installed via package manager. I'd like to upgrade to the latest version (which is not yet available in the package manager) and also would like to keep my current user profile (settings, email accounts and folders). I have read the install instructions [https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/installing-thunderbird-linux#w_insta...] but before I do it I'd like to know if this will keep my profile unchanged and which would be the best option to install: systemwise or localwise?

Thank you, Matei
creator: matei81

title: "Unable to open the summary file for INBOX. Perhaps there was an error on disk, or the full path is too long.
content:
I'm running four email addresses through my thunderbird and a) the last few days I've started getting the above message on my 2 gmails; b) on one of the other accounts ( a non-gmail) it'll says it's getting say 5 messages then none appear. On the left sidebar it'll say there's one email, greyed out, but the main panel says no message found - the recent messages that were in the inbox have disappeared.

The fourth email account is working fine. I've changed nothing that might cause this.

I uninstalled and reinstalled and the same thing is happening.

Can anyone help please? Thanks  :)
creator: katherineandbenette

title: inoltro pec senza allegati
content: Da quando ho installato l'ultimo aggiornamento di TB, inoltrando una PEC non mi cita più il contenuto e non mi inoltra gli allegati, cosa che non succede con la mail normale. Sapete darmi una soluzione al problema? Grazie.
creator: mimmo3

title: problemi con aruba
content: buon giorno dall'8 di gennaio non mi funzionano piu le mail con gli account aruba, mi potete aiutare?
creator: gpbulla

title: error: Saving the message in the mailbox failed. Please check if you have the necessary write permissions in the system and if there is enough free space available to copy the mailbox
content:
Hello, I have a problem as shown in the attached print screen. I have many other mailboxes in Thunderbird and I don't have such problems with them. The one that is causing the error is an old mailbox with a lot of old emails, so it probably needs some memory. Have you encountered this issue before and how did you solve it?

Since the message is in Polish, below I paste the translation: "Saving the message in the mailbox failed. Please check if you have the necessary write permissions in the system and if there is enough free space available to copy the mailbox."

Please help me.

Regards, Kamil Borkowski
creator: kamil.borkowski

title: Wiadomości oznaczone jako przeczytane
content: Witam. Mam na 2 komputerach stacjonarnych aplikację Thunderbird. Mam na nich podpięte te same adresy mailowe. Oprócz tego te same adresy mailowe mamy skonfigurowane na 2 smartfonach (w aplikacji outlook i gmail). W tym momencie jest tak, że na komputerach jak przychodzą maile, to są oznaczone jako nieprzeczytane. Problem jest wtedy jak te same maile wpadają na smartfona, to od razu przekształcają się jako przeczytane w Thunderbird, mimo, że w ogóle ich nie ruszałem w smartfonach. To dotyczy jednego konta mailowego. Na innym jest tak, że w Thunderbird jest jako nieoznaczony mail cały czas, ale jak go tam przeczytam, to na drugim komputerze w Thunderbird odznacza się i jest jako przeczytany, mimo ,że go się nie otwierało. Dlaczego tak się dzieje? Jak zrobić, żeby wszystkie wiadomości, które wpadają do konkretnego Thubderbird były cały czas oznaczone jako nieprzeczytane, dopóki je faktycznie przeczytamy tylko w tym konkretnym programie? Mam nadzieję, że wszystko jest zrozumiałe
creator: wiertarex

title: Intermittent day to day  failure in sending Emails. Report of Outgoing server (SMTP)  timed out.
content:
Trying to cure this. Details: Windows 10 PC with Firefox. Tbird 128.6.0esr (64-bit) . Nortons.

When I boot up first thing, sometimes Emails OK, sometimes Email sending failure, previously sometimes Email receiving failure. Restarting PC or Tbird has no effect.

Rai

content: buongiorno, da stamattina mi è impossibile inoltrare le pec. Nel momento in cui premo inoltra, il corpo della mail rimane vuoto.................

title: Thunderbird empty message when forwarding if signed with S/MIME
content: I have a problem with forwarding messages. This issue only occurs when the message is signed with an S/MIME certificate. Pressing the forward button opens the email forwarding window, but there is no content or attachment in the email. The problem started today after updating to version 128.6.0esr.
creator: mjkoto50

title: Konto einrichten
content: Konto einrichten, Ich versuche, das Konto admin@meine-schatz-kiste.de auf meinem neuen Laptop einzurichten, erhalte jedoch die Fehlermeldung: "Konfiguration nicht möglich, da Benutzername, Mailadresse oder Passwort nicht übereinstimmen." Auf meinem älteren Laptop habe ich alle Angaben überprüft, die korrekt sind, einschließlich des Passworts, welches in meiner Passwortliste erfasst ist. Nachdem ich das bestehende Konto auf dem älteren Laptop gelöscht habe, versuchte ich, das Konto mit einem neuen Passwort neu einzurichten, erhielt jedoch dieselbe Fehlermeldung. Warum passiert das? Es gibt auch keine Option, das Passwort zu ändern. Viele Grüße Brigitte Schinko
creator: info12418

title: Password not accepted
content: Why is this happening for the 2nd time in less than a year? Starting yesterday afternoon I am no longer receiving emails and I get a message saying my password is not recognized.

title: Threads
content:

Thank you! Frani

title: Passeword problem
content: Hello, Since this morning Thunderbird asks for my password everytime I click on my email logo to look at my emails. When I enter the password I can have access to my emails which semm to come in normally. If I close Thunderbird down and come back two minutes later it asks for the password again and so on. Can someone tell me how I can stop this ? Thank You. P.B.
creator: A1A1
